```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Check samples/counts

```{r}
meta<-read_tsv("meta/rna-seq-meta.tsv")
meta
```

```{r}
d1<-read_csv("data/raw_counts-intronic.csv") %>% select(-Gene.name) 
d2<-read_csv("data/raw_counts-intergenic.csv") %>% select(-Gene.name)
df<-left_join(d1,d2)
```


Make tidy

```{r}
tdf<-df %>% pivot_longer(2:22, names_to = c("Sample"), values_to = c("Count"))
```


```{r}
sum<-tdf %>% group_by(Sample) %>% summarize(Total=sum(Count)) %>% arrange(-Total) %>% left_join(meta %>% select(Sample, Donor))
write_csv(sum, file="outputs/205/sums.csv")
```
